reference.shortdesc: An example helps to illustrate the subject of the topic or a portion of the topic.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Use example to contain both sample code (or similar artifacts) and the discussion that illustrates the sample. For example, a topic about programming code could use the example element component to contain both the sample code and the text that describes the code. Similarly, a sample that included preformatted text might use the pre element component along with a paragraph or list to elaborate upon sections of that text.
